name: count
description:
The count command provides fast counting of OSM elements and tag values. It supports:

- Total node/way counts
- Filtered counts by tag
- Grouping by tag key
- Quiet mode for scripting

Optimized for quick statistics without full extraction.

options.-f, --filter: Count elements matching filter (e.g., amenity=*, highway=primary)
options.-t, --type: Element type: nodes, ways, all (default: all)

output:
Element counts showing:
- Node count
- Way count
- Matching elements (if filtered)
- Breakdown by tag value (if --by used)
